flawed_nl_solution:
Out of the 20 students, 20 x 1/4 = <<20*1/4=5>>5 students stayed in the classroom.
While 20 - 5 = <<20-5=14>>14 students went to the playground.
Out of these 14 students, 14 x 1/3 = <<14*1/3=14/3>>14/3 are boys.
Therefore, 14 - 14/3 = <<14-14/3=28/3>>28/3 girl students from this class are in the playground.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 14. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
